content: circle in the round designed by isabel salgueiro aka zzabelinha material 3 balls of 50gr of yarn apropriated for baby 150m/50gr 1 crochet hook 3 5mm size 2/3 years childrens gauge it´s not important in this pattern it will works with any gauge instrutions start with a ring 1 row 3 chain as first double_crochet 17 double_crochet in the ring 2 row 3 chain as first double_crochet * 2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 1 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 3 row as 2nd row 4 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 1 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 5 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 2 double_crochet repeat until the end of the row 6 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 3 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 7 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 4 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 8 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 5 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 9 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 6 double_crochet repeat until the end of the row 10 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 7 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 11row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 8 double_crochet* when you have 24 double_crochet make 20 chain skip 18 chain from the base restart work keep the increases each 8 double_crochet 24 double_crochet before the end of the row repeat from to to the other warm 12row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 9 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 13 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 10dc repeat until the end of the row 14 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 11dc* repeat until the end of the row 15 row 3 chain as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in the same chain increase 12dc* repeat until the end of the row 16row 3ch as first double_crochet *1 chain 1 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 17 row 2 slip_stitch 3 chain as first chain 1 double_crochet *2 double_crochet * in the spaces 18-21 row repeat row 16 and 17 more 2 times 22 row 3 chain 1sc in the spaces bind off sleeves start working to the first sleeve in the rs in one of the holes make 42 double_crochet work in round 2-13 round decrease one chain in each row under the arm use a stitch mark iff you prefer 14rnd 3ch as first double_crochet *1 chain 1 double_crochet* repeat until the end of the row 15 round
